entries.meaning: A joiner's tool having a blade with a handle at each end, used to shave off surfaces, by drawing it toward one; a shave; a drawshave.
A tool used for the purpose of making an incision along the path a saw is to follow, to prevent it from tearing the surface of the wood.

verbs.description: drawknife (third-person singular simple present drawknifes, present participle drawknifing, simple past and past participle drawknifed)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To cut or shave with a drawknife.
